title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Foundations of E-Learning System Development Applying Deductive Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of designing e-learning system architectures using UML (Unified Modeling Language).
Learners can establish prototype implementation plans by applying a modular content development process based on deductive instructional methods.
Learners can propose three or more evaluation criteria for e-learning systems operable in limited technological environments (smartphones).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
